tool_description: Live price charts, trading and alerts for cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH) on Kraken, Coinbase Pro, Binance, and more.
name: Cryptocurrency Markets
title: Cryptocurrency Markets

api_list.name: markets
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-markets1.p.rapidapi.com/markets"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-markets1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
